web_snippets: Dr. Yuan Gao is a director. He joined the Board in October 2023 and served as Director of former LAC from September 2019 to October 2023.
Dr. Yuan Gao, Assistant Professor of the Pharmacology Dept. ... The primary research objective in the Gao lab is to uncover novel fundamental mechanisms ...
Yuan Gao is an Assistant Professor of Chinese History at Case Western Reserve University. She received her Ph.D. in History from Georgetown University in 2024.
